titles.title: Congratulating Qatar on the occasion of Qatari-American Friendship Day.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1012)
Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
5/10/2007--Introduced.
Congratulates Qatar on the occasion of Qatari-American Friendship Day. Commends Qatar's progressive vision for the future. Wishes the Qatari people continued happiness and prosperity. Renews America's commitment to Qatar as a partner in freedom.
